nodes.text: An  antique vase was owned by Senator Avi Singh, gifted to him for valiant service. The vase was located at his residence and, according to his RA-7 protocol droid GS-8, it was most prized to him.

During the occupation of Raxus by the Galactic Empire, Singh was detained by the Imperial authorities, and Clone Force 99 and GS-8 broke him out. Even though GS-8 brought the vase along with them, the senator ultimately smashed it against a clone stormtrooper's head during their escape, destroying it. He commented that he never really cared about the vase anyways.
